column1: “………………. since my land is a fairly large jungle land it was difficult to

early determine the boundaries in the excavated area, although I was certain

hat the proposed power line had encroached my land……………….”
In such circumstances, I am of the view that there is no basis to issue notice on the
Respondents. Thus, the notices are refused and the Petition is dismissed, without costs.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
